short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for TestJet Automation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Testjet is an end-to-end testing automation platform that is currently in development. We are creating an intuitive application that will allow users to create test cases without writing a single line of code. We achieve this through our browser extension, which allows testers to record events and behaviors of users in their browsers and translate them into simple executable tests. Testers can also add custom validations to their test cases accordingly on each step of the test case to validate if an element such as "Text" is visible or if the color of the button is appropriate etc. TestJet aims to reduce test authoring time and help create stable test with minimum maintenance.
